description: The car had messages, including one criticising "globalisation politics", written on its sides.
title: Germany Merkel: Car rams into chancellery gate ahead of Covid decision
title_page: Germany Merkel: Car rams into chancellery gate ahead of Covid decision - BBC News
maintext: Her Christian Democrat (CDU) party is doing well in the opinion polls, partly because of her handling of the pandemic. The government agreed on Wednesday to hold parliamentary elections on 26 September 2021 but the race to succeed Mrs Merkel as the CDU's candidate for chancellor is still to run.
